newsitem.title: USA: GenCorp calls convertible debenture issue.
newsitem.headline: GenCorp calls convertible debenture issue.

text.p: GenCorp said Friday it called for redemption its entire $115 million issue of eight percent convertible subordinated debentures due 2002.
GenCorp said each $1,000 of debentures is convertible into 62.25 common shares until the close of business on the redemption date, set for June 23, 1997.
The company said called debentures which are not tendered for conversion will be redeemed at a price of 104.8 percent of the principal amount plus accrued interest to the redemption date.
